answers.answer: The triple is only approved for GT1 patients by the FDA unless you can find a doctor that will prescribe it off label you won't be able to use the triple

Sorry to hear that standard treatment did not work for you.  Alinia is available in the US by prescription only, and it not 'standard of care' for treating hepatitis c, so whether or not you can start again with Alinia added would depend on whether or not you could find a physician agreeable to prescribing it 'off-label' for you. You might find some useful information here:http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/580934Certainly worth a discussion with your hepatologist/GI or whoever your treatment physician is.  Best of luck to you.hrsepwrguy:Alinia is not part the cocktails most people are referring to when we talk about "Triple" therapy (DAA+Riba+Inf); it's actually an anti-protozoic medication approved for use to treat certain organisms that can cause diarrhea, is actually not currently 'approved' by the FDA for standard hcv treatment.
Thank you for the info I was totally unaware, I like to learn thank you.

Sorry to hear trt didn't work for you this round.  There are a few G4's that frequent the forum, so hopefully they can give you some guidance.  Bali is a great source of information, so you might send him a pm if he doesn't see this thread.   You might also check some of the other Hep C forum's outside of the US, since the % of G4's is very low here.

Hi Koko,I used to be a geno 4 a,c and treated it aggressively with Alinia ,pre & highdosing Ribavirin , extending to 60wks , tapreing of INF.as well as some supplementsMy advise to you is before embarking on another tx  try and find outWHY  you did not respond the first time.Did you do the IL28b test ?Did you check if you are insulin resistant?What is your BMI and what was your Riba dosage?Did you have to reduce INF and/or Riba during tx ?How long did you tx ?What was the reason for failure ( never achieving UND , breakthrough or relapse ) ?Do you know your fibrosis score ?b

thanks everybody  for your response to me , acualy i didn't know any thing about all what you mentioned Bali05 , i didn't have insurance and the county was treating me so I took pegassy as the INF  and Riba dose was 1200 , I didn't change my doase at all for 12 weeks, but Iam diabetic. the Dr didn't make any lab work for me exept viral load anf geno type.

You say you didn`t have insurance , do you have it now ?The fact that there is no other bloodwork other than VL and genofrom your last tx doesn`t give us much information.Seeing that you had a poor response to INF and did not achieveEVR makes me think that you might have a twofold problem.Poor blood sugar metabolism and genetics.Can you do the IL28b test ?How do you take care of your diabetes ?How much do you weigh ?A forum friend of mine geno4 after failing first tx retreated withAlinia and highdose Ribavirin and still failed second tx.He also had blood sugar problems and is a CT.b

I weight 200 pound but i am tall my virus load was 26000 and dropped to only 17000 after 12 week treatment.I took care of my diabetes with midformin.I still don't have insurance but i am working to have one. or look for a free clinical trial I am only in the beginning of the thirty and I feel tired all the time.By the way my blood sugar is not so high.my AIC is 5.8. but how I know if Iam insulin Resistance or not? Thanks for your info.

question: I stoped my tx becase I didn't respond can I start again with tripil tx including Alinia. Iam G4
title: Alinia
